full_text:
Bonds are on pace for their worst year in history. 

The rise in interest rates this year...
-30-yr treasury yield: 1.91% -> 2.95%
-10-yr treasury yield: 1.51% -> 2.86%
-5-yr treasury yield: 1.26% -> 2.79%
-2-yr treasury yield: 0.73% -> 2.46%
-1-yr treasury yield: 0.39% -> 1.84% https://t.co/JoLodxhW7E

localize.full_text:

今年の金利上昇は...
-30年物国債利回り：1.91% -> 2.95
-10年物国債利回り：1.51% -> 2.86%。
-5年物国債利回り：1.26％ -> 2.79
-2年物国債利回り：0.73% -> 2.46
-1年物国債利回り：0.39% -> 1.84% https://t.co/JoLodxhW7E

-1年期国债收益率：0.39% -> 1.84% https://t.co/JoLodxhW7E
